components.name: Application Layer
components.description: EC2 instances (web & app servers) in an Auto Scaling group handling business logic and dynamic content.

components.name: Data Layer
components.description: Amazon RDS (primary + standby) and Elastic Cache for structured data and in‑memory caching.

components.name: Content Delivery Layer
components.description: Amazon S3 bucket for static assets served via CloudFront CDN.

components.name: Load Balancing Layer
components.description: Route 53 DNS routing to an Elastic Load Balancer distributing traffic to the application layer.

data_flows.description: User requests resolved by Route 53 and forwarded to ELB.
Traffic distributed to EC2 instances for request processing.
Business logic queries RDS or Elastic Cache for data.
Requests for static assets are served from S3 via CloudFront.

trust_boundaries.name: Internet Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between external users and Route 53/ELB.

trust_boundaries.name: Application Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between ELB and application servers.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between application servers and the Data Layer.
